description.value:
Trigger An enemy or hazard's effect hits you or you fail a Fortitude save against one.

The strength of stone overcomes you so strongly that it replaces your stout body. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Petrified] until the end of the current turn. You don't take any damage from the triggering effect or any other ill effects that couldn't affect stone.
